---
labels: ['module', templates, starters]
description: 'React workspace starters'
---

Starters for building React applications and components.

Features:

- Full stack React app.
- Static React app.

## Use in your env

You can compose the starters into your dev environment:

```ts
class MyEnv {
  starters() {
    return StarterList.from([
      ReactWorkspaceStarter.from()
    ]);
  }
}
```

## Fork the starters

You can fork the starters and customize them for your own needs. To fork the starters run the following command:

```
bit fork bitdev.react/generators/react-starters
```
